AlternativePaymentMethod.name: AlternativePaymentMethod
AlternativePaymentMethod.description: Represents a payment method that isn’t cash, a debit card, or a credit card. This object defines methods that aren’t defined by the CardPaymentMethod or DigitalWallet objects. Examples of alternative payment methods include CashOnDeliver, Klarna, and Direct Debit. AlternativePaymentMethod functions the same as any other type of payment method for processing transactions through a payment gateway.

AccountId.description: The account for the alternative payment method.

AlternativePaymentMethod​Number.description: Salesforce ID number for the alternative payment method.

AuditEmail.description: The email address of the payment owner where audit information about payments is sent.

BankAccountHolderType.description: Determines if the bank account is held by a business or an individual.

BankAccountType.description: Type of bank account such as a checking or savings account.

BillingFirstName.description: The first name of the payment method owner, based on their billing address details.

BillingLastName.description: The last name of the payment method owner, based on their billing address details.

BillingName.description: The first and last name of the payment method owner, based on their billing address details.

Comments.description: Users can add comments to provide additional details about a record. Maximum of 1000 characters.

CompanyName.description: Company name for this payment method. Part of the payment method’s address.

Email.description: Email address of the payment method holder.

GatewayToken.description: Tokenized form of the alternative payment method, returned by the gateway. Stored as encrypted text.

GatewayTokenDetails.description: A unique tokenized ID generated by the payment gateway when this payment method first interacts with the gateway. Used to identify the payment method during future transactions.

IpAddress.description: IP address for the payment method owner.

IsAutoPayEnabled.description: Indicates whether the payment method can be used for recurring payments (True) or not (False). The default value is False.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record, a record related to this record, or a list view.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, it's possible the user only accessed this record or list view (LastReferencedDate) but not viewed it.

MacAddress.description: Mac Address of the payment method holder.

NickName.description: User-defined nickname for this payment method.

OwnerId.description: The user who owns the alternative payment method.

PaymentGatewayId.description: ID of the payment gateway entity used to handle transactions from this payment method.

PaymentMethodAddress.description: Full address associated with the alternative payment method. For more information about address fields, see Address Compound Fields.

PaymentMethodDetails.description: Optional information about the payment method type. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

PaymentMethodGeocode​Accuracy.description: Accuracy level of the geocode for the payment method address. An accuracy level contains information about the location of a latitude and longitude. For more information about geolocation fields, see Geolocation Compound Field.

PaymentMethodLatitude.description: Latitude of the payment method address. Used with the PaymentMethodLongitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. For details about geolocation compound fields, see Compound Field Considerations and Limitations.

PaymentMethodLongitude.description: Longitude of the payment method address. Used with the PaymentMethodLatitude to specify the precise geolocation of the address. For details about geolocation compound fields, see Compound Field Considerations and Limitations.

PaymentMethodPostalCode.description: Details of the address for this payment method.

PaymentMethodState.description: Details of the address for this payment method.

PaymentMethodStreet.description: Details of the address for this payment method.

PaymentMethodSubType.description: More information about the payment method. For example, if the PaymentMethodType is Visa, this field can be a digital wallet. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

PaymentMethodType.description: Payment method used for the transaction, such as Visa, Mastercard, EPS, SepaDebit, and Klarna. This field is available in API version 57.0 and later.

Phone.description: Phone number of the payment method's owner.

ProcessingMode.description: Indicates whether the payment method was created in Salesforce or externally. Required.

SavedPaymentMethodId.description: The ID of the saved payment method record.

StandardEntryClassCode.description: A three-letter code that indicates how a customer or a business initiated and authorized an ACH payment.

Status.description: The state of the payment method. Required.

AlternativePaymentMethod.accessRules: Salesforce Payments, Salesforce Order Management, B2B Commerce, D2C Commerce, Lightning Experience
